_source.short_desc: CosmoLex is the only cloud-based, total practice management, billing, and accounting system (no QuickBooks? required).
_source.long_desc: Thousands of law firms have switched to CosmoLex - the only cloud-based, law practice management software with built-in, compliant legal accounting (no QuickBooks needed). CosmoLex eliminates the struggle of juggling separate systems for law practice management, billing, and accounting. LawPay credit card processing is also built-in with no fixed monthly fee. Simply log into CosmoLex Cloud - anytime, anywhere - to get everything you need to run your entire law practice. Try free today!
_source.target_audience: We help law firms run their practice with maximum efficiency. They need a one-price, one-login system that includes practice management, billing, and accounting.

category_features.name: Billing Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can view past bills and pay current invoices

category_features.name: Contact Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database of an organization's customers and clients

category_features.name: Contingency Billing
category_features.definition: Business model where clients pay their lawyer a fee only if the case is won/settled successfully

category_features.name: Customizable Invoices
category_features.definition: Brand invoices with organization's logo

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Hourly Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that charges based on the amount of time spent

category_features.name: Mobile Payments
category_features.definition: Clients can submit payments via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Online Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create, send, and view electronic invoices

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Payment webpage where clients can pay bills

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Project Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients an amount based on the project/task/job performed

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients repeatedly based on set amount of time

category_features.name: Tax Calculation
category_features.definition: Location based taxes

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tracks employee schedules, availability, performance

category_features.name: Financial Management
category_features.definition: Provide a comprehensive overview of organization's finances

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Marketing Automation
category_features.definition: Plan, track, and evaluate marketing activities including promotions, customer outreach, and branding

category_features.name: Order Management
category_features.definition: Organize, track, monitor and execute customer orders for goods, investments, or any other purcahses

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Purchasing & Receiving
category_features.definition: Buy necessary items in compliance with established business policies

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and record hours worked and costs spent to assist in billing and invoicing

category_features.name: Training Management
category_features.definition: Track employee's progression through training programs

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.name: Activity Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor and track project related activities based on various metrics

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (i.e. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Detailed log and record of costs

category_features.name: Project Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor the position or progress of tasks or projects from start to finish

category_features.name: Reimbursement Management
category_features.definition: Manage compensation for out-of-pocket expenses incurred by an employee, client or another party

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: Time Tracking by Client
category_features.definition: Track time worked per client

category_features.name: Time Tracking by Project
category_features.definition: Track time worked per project

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Invoicing Software makes it easy to create & customize your invoices. It's easy to add your company logo, modify colors, select fonts, and choose the items that will appear on your invoices. Email online invoices directly to your customers, you can even schedule invoices to be automatically generated and sent to the customers that you bill regularly. QuickBooks is the world's #1 accounting solution, with over 4.8 million users worldwide. Try QuickBooks Online for Free Today!

related_products.short_desc: An easy invoicing and accounting solution starting at $7.50/mth (first 4 mths). Join 24 million people who've already used FreshBooks.
related_products.features: FreshBooks makes small business invoicing and billing so simple, you'll be amazed at the time you have to focus on doing what you love and how much faster you get paid. Who would have thought invoice software could do that? Try it free for 30 days, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your bills & invoices with Xero. Reduce admin time, pay your bills on time and make sure you get paid within your payment terms.
related_products.features: With Xero it's easy to take care of your bills and to invoice your customers. Easily understand and manage your cash flow, get a view of what bills are due for payment and which of your invoices are outstanding or paid. Schedule payments, batch pay suppliers and spend less time on business admin by paying multiple bills in one simple transaction. You'll avoid late fees and build good relationships with your suppliers by paying your bills on time.

related_products.short_desc: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.
related_products.features: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.

related_products.short_desc: Hubstaff has trusted time tracking and employee monitoring for remote and field teams. Scheduling, invoicing, billing, payroll, more.
related_products.features: Fight inefficiency and work better with streamlined time tracking from Hubstaff. Track time through simple desktop, web, and mobile apps, then manage invoicing, billing, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Jira, Asana, Github, Slack, and Paypal. See work happen in real-time, track location with GPS and geofences, identify roadblocks and keep moving forward. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS & Android.

related_products.short_desc: See everything about your customers in one place, such as payment details, life-time value, overall customer ranking, CRM, and more.
related_products.features: Send invoices with ease. Create and send online invoices and estimates in minutes. Get paid in one click 24/7 from any device. Keep track of the status of all your invoices in real time from one place.

related_products.short_desc: Optimize receivables and accelerate cash flow by automating billing and invoicing processes with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.
related_products.features: With NetSuite, easily and quickly generate and send invoices.  Automatically convert sales orders to invoices as orders are fulfilled. Customizable invoice templates let you meet customers' unique billing needs.  Consolidate invoices when multiple orders are placed within a single billing period. Transactions are posted to the GL automatically, which saves time, helps avoid error-prone manual data entry, and ensures AR data is always up to date. Easily manage recurring subscription billing.

related_products.short_desc: Optimize receivables and accelerate cash flow by automating billing and invoicing processes with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.
related_products.features: With NetSuite, easily and quickly generate and send invoices.  Automatically convert sales orders to invoices as orders are fulfilled. Customizable invoice templates let you meet customers' unique billing needs.  Consolidate invoices when multiple orders are placed within a single billing period. Transactions are posted to the GL automatically, which saves time, helps avoid error-prone manual data entry, and ensures AR data is always up to date. Easily manage recurring subscription billing.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the frustrations and errors of traditional invoicing software by taking advantage of PandaDoc sales invoice software.
related_products.features: PandaDoc is easy-to-use cloud software for companies of all sizes and business needs. There is one dashboard to create, customize, eSign, and send invoices quickly. The intuitive and user-friendly interface helps you to save tons of time and close deals faster. PandaDoc is the best tool for all of your client-facing documents including contracts, proposals, and quotes. With iOS and Android apps, stay in touch and keep your business moving forward from anywhere.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

similar_products.short_desc: Optimize receivables and accelerate cash flow by automating billing and invoicing processes with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve budgeting, project oversight, team communication, task management, resource management, invoicing, and project financials.
similar_products.features: Time is money. Use BigTime to save both. BigTime is the only time, billing, and expense tracking and payment platform that protects your time like your wallet depends on it. Seriously, it takes fewer clicks to accomplish any task. BigTime gives you the tools you need to deliver billable work on time and on budget, giving our customers an average improvement of 25% in gross margins and a substantial increase in expansion and referral revenue. Sign up for a free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: Bill.com is the intelligent business payments platform that delivers financial process efficiency, time savings, and full control.
similar_products.features: Bill.com delivers financial process efficiency through streamlined accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) management. Reduce errors and increase efficiency by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Bill.com gets more intelligent as you use it, learning your processes and preferences to give you greater control over every aspect of bill management.

similar_products.short_desc: New realities call for new solutions. We are the #1 time and billing, and payments software for law firms. Try for FREE now.
similar_products.features: At HALF THE COST of other solutions, TimeSolv provides the robust time and billing needs companies demand without the extra features you never use. For over 20 years, our web-based solution has helped companies increase their billable time and get paid faster, whether at home or in the office. Integrate with QuickBooks, Office 365 and more. Try for FREE now and learn why tens of thousands of professionals have made the switch.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusebill offers flexible subscription billing and invoicing software that allows businesses to scale through every stage of growth.
similar_products.features:
Automate billing and invoicing like hundreds of our clients in SaaS, IoT, media, and more. Eliminate manual billing. Reduce revenue leaks and churn. 

Fusebill simplifies all aspects of subscription billing and management, automating recurring invoicing, payments, and revenue recognition while streamlining customer lifecycle management to maximize revenue. Fusebill's flexible ledger-based platform allows you to scale your business with absolute confidence.

similar_products.short_desc: ZarMoney does it all... And does it better! We believe an outside-the-box accounting solution should have out-of-this-world support.
similar_products.features:

Some Benefits Include:
*No more costly monthly charges for accounting software.
*Save more time and be more productive with ZarMoney.
*Track all your business and profits in one place.
*Business software support  

Get started now! No credit card required to get full FREE Access.

similar_products.short_desc: Payference is the all-in-one tool for real-time, dynamic cash forecasting. Take the guesswork out of cash management.
similar_products.features:
Take the guesswork out of cash management. Manage your entire cash flow and working capital options with Payference. Improve cash flow with speedier collections and better forecasting in one easy to use solution. 

Plus, we have seamless integrations with your ERP/accounting system, banks and payment channels, giving you a wholistic view of your cash on hand in real-time. Want to learn more? Visit www.payference.com.

similar_products.short_desc: All your purchases, one weekly or monthly invoice with perfectly-coded spend data-paid on your terms. It's that simple.
similar_products.features: Bring Order to your invoice management. Pay 1 weekly or monthly invoice for all your purchases instead of paying each vendor individually, or automatically schedule payments to vendors regardless of their accepted payment method. Ensure accuracy with 3-way matching and receive perfectly coded invoices with line level detail that can be easily exported into accounting or ERP systems. The cherry on top-peace of mind knowing you can quickly find any invoice or payment made through Order.

It is an all-inclusive automated subscription billing and payment processing platform equipped with robust features for handling subscriptions, managing subscribers, proration, dunning, billing & tax mgmt., integrations, pricing optimization, payment processing,

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Receivable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Receivable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Receivable software deals with money that is owed to an organization. It automates the recording of payments on outstanding invoices and provides reports on collection and aging. Along with reports, Accounts Receivable applications generate monthly customer statements and collection letters. Accounts Receivable solutions integrate with Accounting software. Accounts Receivable software is related to Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Debt Collection software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Debt Collection tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Debt Collection software automates the management and accounting process for overdue invoices on behalf of an organization or a specialized collection agency. Debt Collection applications can integrate with existing accounting and invoicing systems. Debt Collection software is related to Accounting software, Banking Systems software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Expense Report software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Expense Report tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Expense Report software assists organizations in keeping track of their business and travel expenses. These applications allow employees to submit records of their expenditures. For smaller businesses, spreadsheet-generating software creates reports to allow for better budgeting. Expense Report software is related to Budgeting software, Financial Reporting software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Court Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Court Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Court Management software provides solutions for case management including docketing, workflow, calendar, concise case summaries, judicial assignments, and more. Court Management software is related to Legal Case Management software, Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Calendar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Calendar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Calendar software helps attorneys to manage their schedules. These applications allow users to schedule events and appointments, set deadline reminders and notifies of any conflicts. Legal Calendar software is related to Court Management software, Law Practice Management software, Legal Billing software and Legal Case Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Case Management software coordinates documents, scheduling, conflicts, contacts, and reporting associated with legal cases. These applications enable an integrated solution to automate case management, client history tracking, and contracts as well as billing and accounting. Legal Case Management solutions also often include database management, electronic discovery, and automatic document template editing features, enabling organizations to manage, distribute, and update key case-related data. Legal Case Management software is related to Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Research software and services aggregate court judgements, legislation, regulations and case law from a variety of sources as well as provide tools for automating legislation discovery and analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Trust Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Trust Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Trust Accounting software allows administrators to manage trusts, estates and investment portfolios. Trust Accounting solutions can be used by bank trust departments, accountants, law firms, non-profit organizations and independent trust companies and helps to keep administrators in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Trust Accounting software is related to Accounting software, Fund Accounting software, Law Practice Management software, Investment Management software and Legal Billing software.
